source: Official bank websites (hdfcbank.com, sbicard.com, icicibank.com, axisbank.com, canarabank.com etc.)

cards.name: HDFC Infinia
cards.notes: 5 RP/₹150. 1 RP=₹1 via SmartBuy. 10x on SmartBuy (cap 15,000 bonus RP/mo, 25,000 total/statement, valid till Mar 2026). RP redemption max 5x/mo (from Feb 2026). Invite-only. Unlimited lounge. No fuel/wallet/rent.

cards.name: HDFC Diners Club Black
cards.notes: 5 RP/₹150. 1 RP=₹1 via SmartBuy. 10x on SmartBuy (cap 15,000 bonus RP/mo, 25,000 total/statement). Welcome: Club Marriott + Swiggy One + Amazon Prime on ₹1.5L in 90 days. Monthly milestone: 2x ₹500 vouchers on ₹80K/mo spend. 10,000 Bonus RP on ₹4L/qtr. Unlimited lounge (1,300+). 6 golf/qtr. Fee waived on ₹8L spend. No fuel/wallet/rent.

cards.name: HDFC Regalia
cards.notes: 4 RP/₹150. 1 RP=₹0.50 SmartBuy. Up to 5x on SmartBuy. 7.5% dining discount via Swiggy Dineout (Good Food Trail). 24x7 concierge. 15,000 bonus RP milestone. No fuel/wallet/rent.

cards.name: HDFC Regalia Gold
cards.notes: 4 RP/₹150 base. 20 RP/₹150 (5x) on Nykaa, Myntra, M&S, Reliance Digital. 1 RP=₹0.50. Complimentary Swiggy One + MMT Black Gold membership. ₹1,500 voucher on ₹1.5L/qtr. ₹5,000 on ₹5L/yr. No fuel/wallet/rent.

cards.name: HDFC Regalia First
cards.notes: 3 RP/₹150 (w.e.f. Sep 2024). 1 RP=₹0.50 (=1% effective). Bonus 7,500 RP on ₹6L + 5,000 on ₹9L/yr. 20% off dining via Swiggy Dineout. Renewal fee waived on ₹1L/yr. No fuel/wallet/EMI.

cards.name: HDFC Millennia
cards.notes: 5% CashBack on Amazon, Flipkart, Myntra, Tata CLiQ, Swiggy, Zomato, Uber, BookMyShow, Sony LIV, Cult.fit, BigBasket. 1% others. ₹1,000 voucher or lounge on ₹1L spend/qtr. No fuel/wallet/rent.

cards.name: HDFC MoneyBack+
cards.notes: 10x CashPoints on Amazon, Flipkart, Swiggy, BigBasket (~5%). 2 CP/₹150 on others (~1%). Max 2,500 CP/mo. No fuel/wallet/rent.

cards.name: HDFC Swiggy
cards.notes: 10% Swiggy (food/Instamart/Dineout) cap ₹1,500/mo. 5% select online cap ₹1,500/mo. 1% others cap ₹500/mo. Total cap ₹3,500/mo.

cards.name: HDFC Tata Neu Infinity
cards.notes: 5% NeuCoins on Tata ecosystem (BigBasket, Croma, 1mg, Westside, Taj etc). 1.5% others. Cap 2,000 NeuCoins/mo per category. No fuel/wallet/rent.

cards.name: HDFC Tata Neu Plus
cards.notes: 2% NeuCoins on Tata ecosystem. 1% on all other spends. Entry-level Tata co-brand. No fuel/wallet/rent.

cards.name: HDFC Diners Club Privilege
cards.notes: 20 RP/₹150 on Swiggy & Zomato (=6.67%). 4 RP/₹150 base (=1.33%). 1 RP=₹0.50. BookMyShow BOGO: 2 free tickets/mo (Fri-Sun, max ₹250/ticket). Quarterly voucher (O2 Spa/Lakme) on ₹1.5L spend. Welcome: ₹500 voucher on ₹75K in 90 days. Fee waived on ₹3L spend. No fuel/wallet/rent.

cards.name: HDFC IndianOil
cards.notes: 5% Fuel Points at IndianOil, groceries & bills. 1 FP/₹150 on others (~0.64%). 1% fuel surcharge waiver.

cards.name: HDFC Bharat Cashback
cards.notes: 5% on fuel (all brands). 5% on utility/telecom. 1% others. Cap ₹1,000/mo. RuPay benefits apply.

cards.name: HDFC Pixel Play
cards.notes: Up to 5% cashback on select online merchants. 1% on others. Fully digital card via PayZapp. Lifetime Free. Customizable card design.

cards.name: Marriott Bonvoy HDFC Diners
cards.notes: 8 Marriott Bonvoy points/₹150 on Marriott stays (~4% travel). 4 points/₹150 on others (~1.33%). First hotel co-brand in India.

cards.name: 6E Rewards HDFC IndiGo
cards.notes: 6E Rewards on IndiGo bookings (~3% travel). Base rewards on other spends. Good for frequent IndiGo flyers.

cards.name: HDFC InterMiles Signature
cards.notes: Accelerated InterMiles on travel (~3%). Base 4 RP/₹150 on others (~1.33%). Transfer to airline partners. 1% fuel surcharge waiver.

cards.name: HDFC Shoppers Stop
cards.notes: 6 First Citizen points/₹150 at Shoppers Stop (~3%). 2 RP/₹150 on others (~0.67%). Best for Shoppers Stop regulars.

cards.name: HDFC IRCTC RuPay
cards.notes: Up to 5% value back on IRCTC bookings. Base rewards on other spends. RuPay UPI benefits. For frequent train travelers.

cards.name: SBI Cashback
cards.notes: 5% on online spends, 1% offline. Cap ₹5,000/statement. EXCLUDED: Utility bills, Insurance, Fuel, Rent, Wallet, Education, Jewellery, Railways — 0% on these even if paid online. Fee waived on ₹2L spend. Use Amazon GC route to bypass utility exclusion.

cards.name: SBI Card ELITE
cards.notes: 5x RP on dining, groceries, dept stores (~2.5%). 2 RP/₹100 base (~0.5%). 2 free movie tickets/mo via BookMyShow (worth ~₹500). Priority Pass lounge. Concierge (flowers, gifts, doctor). Welcome gift ₹5,000. Fee waived on ₹10L spend.

cards.name: SBI Card PRIME
cards.notes: 10 RP/₹100 on dining, groceries, movies (~2.5%). 2 RP/₹100 base (~0.5%). 20x RP on birthday (cap 2,000 RP). 4 golf rounds free + 50% off games + 1 lesson/mo. ITC Hotels membership (cards from Sep 2025). Welcome gift ₹3,000. Fee waived on ₹3L spend.

cards.name: SBI SimplyCLICK
cards.notes: 10x RP on partners (Amazon, Apollo 24x7, BookMyShow, Cleartrip, Dominos, IGP, Myntra, Netmeds, Yatra) ~2.5%. 5x on other online ~1.25%. 1 RP/₹100 offline ~0.25%. Welcome: ₹500 Amazon GC. Fee waived on ₹1L spend.

cards.name: SBI SimplySAVE
cards.notes: 10 RP/₹150 on dining, groceries, movies, dept stores (~1.67%). 1 RP/₹150 on others (~0.17%). Good offline rewards card.

cards.name: SBI BPCL Octane
cards.notes: Up to ₹7.25 back per ₹100 at BPCL pumps. 1% on others. 1% fuel surcharge waiver. Best fuel card for BPCL users.

cards.name: Flipkart SBI Card
cards.notes: 5% on Flipkart/Myntra/Cleartrip. 2.5% on preferred partners. 1% on others. Fee waived on ₹3.5L spend. 1% fuel surcharge waiver.

cards.name: IRCTC SBI Card Premier
cards.notes: 10% value back on AC1/AC2/AC3/CC train bookings. 5% on air/catering via IRCTC. 1 RP/₹125 on others. Transaction charge waiver on IRCTC.

cards.name: PhonePe SBI PURPLE
cards.notes: 3 RP/₹100 on PhonePe (~0.75%). 2 RP/₹100 online (~0.5%). 1 RP/₹100 others (~0.25%). Lifetime Free. UPI rewards via RuPay.

cards.name: Titan SBI Card
cards.notes: 7.5% cashback at World of Titan, Taneira, Fastrack, Sonata etc (cap ₹10K/qtr). 6 RP/₹100 on others (~1.5%). For Titan brand shoppers.

cards.name: SBI Card AURUM
cards.notes: 6 Travel Credits/₹200 on travel (~3%). 3 RP/₹200 on others (~0.75%). 5,000 Travel Credits welcome. Premium travel card.

cards.name: Amazon Pay ICICI
cards.notes: 5% on Amazon (Prime), 3% (non-Prime). 2% on bill payments. 1% others. Lifetime Free. No fuel/wallet.

cards.name: ICICI Emeralde Private Metal
cards.notes: ~3% reward rate. Unlimited domestic & international lounge. Unlimited golf. Up to 50% dining. No fuel/wallet/rent/gaming.

cards.name: ICICI Emeralde
cards.notes: ~1.5% effective. Premium lounge access. Transport cap ₹20K/mo. 2% DCC markup. No fuel/wallet/rent/gaming.

cards.name: ICICI Sapphiro
cards.notes: ~0.75% base. ~2% on groceries & utilities. 6x-12x via iShop. 4,000 bonus RP on ₹4L spend. Fee waived on ₹6L spend. No fuel/wallet/rent/gaming.

cards.name: ICICI Rubyx
cards.notes: 2 RP/₹100 domestic (~1% with good redemption). 4 RP/₹100 international. Lounge access. Transport cap ₹20K/mo. No fuel/wallet/rent.

cards.name: ICICI Coral
cards.notes: 6 RP/₹200 (~0.75%). BOGO BookMyShow (₹25K spend in prior qtr). Transport cap ₹10K/mo. No fuel/wallet/rent/gaming.

cards.name: ICICI Platinum Chip
cards.notes: Basic entry-level card. ~0.5% rewards. No joining/annual fee. Dining discounts. No fuel rewards.

cards.name: ICICI HPCL Super Saver
cards.notes: 5% at HPCL pumps/HP Pay. 5% on groceries. 1% others. Best fuel card for HPCL users.

cards.name: ICICI HPCL Coral
cards.notes: 2.5% discount on fuel at HPCL. 2 RP/₹100 on all spends (~0.5%). Entry-level fuel card ₹199 fee.

cards.name: MakeMyTrip ICICI
cards.notes: Up to 2 MyCash/₹100 on travel (~2%). Milestone MyCash benefits. ₹1,000 MakeMyTrip voucher on joining. No fuel rewards.

cards.name: Axis Magnus
cards.notes: 12 EDGE pts/₹200 base (~1.2%). 25,000 bonus pts on ₹1L/mo spend. Up to 40% off dining at 4,000+ restaurants. Airport concierge across 29 cities. Unlimited domestic + international lounge. 2% forex. Fee waived on ₹25L spend.

cards.name: Axis Reserve
cards.notes: 2x RP on international. ~4% on travel. ~2% base. 1.5% forex markup. Ultra-premium. Fee waived on ₹25L spend.

cards.name: Axis Atlas
cards.notes: 5 EDGE Miles/₹100 on airlines & hotels (=3.75%). 2 Miles/₹100 others (=1.5%). 15+ airline transfer partners.

cards.name: Axis Select
cards.notes: 10,000 EDGE RP on activation. 6 complimentary golf rounds/yr. 5,000 RP on ₹3L spend milestone. ~1% base.

cards.name: Axis Flipkart
cards.notes: 7.5% Myntra (cap ₹4K/qtr). 5% Flipkart & Cleartrip (cap ₹4K/qtr). 4% Swiggy/Uber/PVR. 1% others. Welcome (Feb 2026): BMS ₹250 + Flipkart ₹250 voucher + 3-mo Myntra Insider on first txn in 30 days. No fuel/utility/rent.

cards.name: Axis Flipkart Super Elite
cards.notes: Up to 12 SuperCoins/₹100 on Flipkart (Plus). 6 SC/₹100 non-Plus. 2 SC/₹100 others. ₹500 off Myntra. 15% off flights. Premium Flipkart co-brand.

cards.name: Axis ACE
cards.notes: 5% on utility bills (Google Pay, PhonePe, electricity, broadband). 1.5% others. Fee waived on ₹2L spend. No fuel rewards.

cards.name: Axis Cashback
cards.notes: 2-7% cashback on online transactions (avg ~5%). 0.75% offline & travel. 0.5% on utilities. 5,000 EDGE RP welcome. Fee waived on ₹4L spend.

cards.name: Axis Rewards
cards.notes: Up to 20 EDGE RP/₹125 on dining & grocery (10x = ~3.2%). 2 RP/₹125 base (~0.4%). 1,500 bonus RP monthly milestone. No fuel/utility.

cards.name: Axis Airtel
cards.notes: 25% on Airtel recharges. 10% on Swiggy/Zomato/BigBasket. 10% on utility bills via Airtel Thanks. 1% others.

cards.name: Axis MyZone
cards.notes: 0.4% base (4 EDGE RP/₹200 @ ₹0.20). 10x weekend dining partners (=4%). 5x weekend shopping (=2%). No RP on fuel/movies/utilities. BOGO movies. ₹120 off Swiggy. Often available as LTF.

cards.name: Axis Horizon (ex-Citi PremierMiles)
cards.notes: 5,000 EDGE Miles welcome. Accelerated miles on travel (~3%). 2 miles/₹100 on others (~1.5%). Quarterly lounge access. Rebranded from Citi PremierMiles.

cards.name: Axis Signature
cards.notes: 10 pts/₹200 domestic (~1%). 20 pts/₹200 international (~2%). 2 domestic lounge/qtr. Priority Pass. Insurance covers.

cards.name: Axis Google Pay
cards.notes: Earn stars redeemable as cashback on Google Pay (1 star = ₹1). ~2% on online & bill payments. 15% off dining via EazyDiner. LTF variants available.

cards.name: IndianOil Axis Bank
cards.notes: Up to 4.25% at IndianOil outlets. 1% others. 1% fuel surcharge waiver. Fee waived on ₹3.5L spend.

cards.name: Kotak Cashback+
cards.notes: 5% on online grocery, food delivery & entertainment. 3% on fuel (all brands). 0.5% on others. Cap 500 pts/cycle on accelerated categories. No utility/rent/insurance/wallet rewards. BOGO PVR.

cards.name: Kotak Delight Platinum
cards.notes: Up to 10% on dining, travel & movies (cap ₹600/cycle for dining under ₹4K). 1% others. Lifetime Free.

cards.name: Kotak 811 #DreamDifferent
cards.notes: 3 RP/₹100 (1,000 RP = ₹100 → ~0.3%). Lifetime Free. Entry-level secured card. Min limit ₹5,000.

cards.name: Kotak Urbane Gold
cards.notes: 3 RP/₹100 (1,000 RP = ₹100 → ~0.3%). 4 PVR tickets or 10,000 RP on ₹1L annual spend. 1% fuel surcharge waiver.

cards.name: Kotak League Platinum
cards.notes: 2 RP/₹100 online (~0.2%). 1 RP/₹100 others (~0.1%). 1% fuel surcharge waiver. Lifetime Free entry-level card.

cards.name: Kotak White
cards.notes: White Pass value redeemable for luxury brand vouchers (~1.5%). 8 domestic lounge visits/yr. 2% forex markup. Premium lifestyle card.

cards.name: Kotak Privy League Signature
cards.notes: 8x RP/₹150 on special categories, 4x on others up to ₹2L, 8x on all above ₹2L (~1.33% avg). 2% forex markup on paid variant. Privy League customers.

cards.name: Kotak Mojo
cards.notes: 2.5 Mojo pts/₹100 online (~0.5%). 1 Mojo pt/₹100 others (~0.25%). 8 domestic lounge/yr. Fee waived on ₹1L spend.

cards.name: Kotak Myntra
cards.notes: Up to 5% cashback on Myntra. Welcome ₹500 Myntra voucher. Myntra Insider membership. 1% on others. Fee waived on spend threshold.

cards.name: Kotak IndiGo 6E Rewards XL Signature
cards.notes: Up to 21 IndiGo BluChips/₹100 on IndiGo (~3.5% travel). IndiGo vouchers worth ₹16,000/yr. 8 lounge visits.

cards.name: Kotak IndiGo 6E Rewards Platinum
cards.notes: Up to 19 IndiGo BluChips/₹100 on IndiGo (~2.5% travel). Welcome ticket ₹3,000. Priority boarding.

cards.name: Kotak Silk Inspire
cards.notes: Designed for women. ~0.3% rewards. Lifestyle privileges. Lifetime Free.

cards.name: Kotak IndianOil
cards.notes: Up to 4% fuel savings at IndianOil outlets. 0.5% on others. 1% fuel surcharge waiver.

cards.name: PVR Kotak Platinum
cards.notes: 2 free PVR tickets/mo. 15% cashback on F&B at PVR. 5% on PVR ticket purchases. ~0.3% on others.

cards.name: IDFC FIRST Select
cards.notes: 3x up to ₹20K/mo, 10x after (1 RP/₹125 @ ₹0.25). Effective ~0.6% base, up to 2% on high spends. Lifetime Free. No fuel/utility/rent/gaming. Never-expiring RP.

cards.name: IDFC FIRST Wealth
cards.notes: Best IDFC card. 10x = 2.5% (1 RP/₹100 @ ₹0.25). 1.5% forex markup. Lifetime Free. No fuel/utility/rent/gaming.

cards.name: IDFC FIRST Millennia
cards.notes: 10x = 1.67% (1 RP/₹150 @ ₹0.25). 3x base ~0.5%. Lifetime Free. Entry-level. No fuel/utility/rent.

cards.name: IDFC FIRST Classic
cards.notes: Entry-level ~0.5% base. Lifetime Free. Lower income eligibility (₹25K/mo). No fuel/utility/rent.

cards.name: IDFC FIRST Ashva
cards.notes: Premium card ~2.5%. Lounge access. Rewards never expire. No fuel/utility/rent/gaming.

cards.name: IDFC FIRST HPCL Power+
cards.notes: Accelerated rewards on HPCL fuel (~5%). 0.5% on others. Lifetime Free. Fuel surcharge waiver.

cards.name: IndianOil RBL XTRA
cards.notes: 10 Fuel Points/₹100 at IOCL (~7.5%). 1 FP/₹100 others (~0.5%). Top fuel card for IndianOil. Fee waived on ₹2.5L spend.

cards.name: RBL Paisabazaar Duet Plus
cards.notes: 2.5% on travel & dining. 1% on others. Cap ₹500/mo. Lifetime Free.

cards.name: RBL ShopRite
cards.notes: Accelerated RP on grocery & fuel. ~3% groceries. ~1% fuel. 0.5% others.

cards.name: RBL World Safari
cards.notes: 5 RP/₹100 on travel (~2.5%). 2 RP/₹100 domestic (~0.5%). Zero forex markup. Premium travel card.

cards.name: Scapia Federal Bank
cards.notes: 2% on all spends (incl. insurance & jewellery — rare). 4% on Scapia app travel bookings. Zero forex. Lifetime Free. Unlimited lounge access.

cards.name: Amex SmartEarn
cards.notes: 10x MR on Zomato/Ajio/Nykaa/BookMyShow/Uber (~5%). 5x on Amazon (~2.5%). 1 MR/₹50 base (~0.5%). Fee waived on ₹40K spend. No fuel/utility.

cards.name: Amex Membership Rewards (MRCC)
cards.notes: 1 MR/₹50 (~0.5% base). BUT milestone bonuses: 1,000 MR on 4x ₹1,500 txns/mo + 1,000 on ₹20K/mo → effective ~6% at ₹20K/mo spend. MR points never expire. No fuel/utility.

cards.name: Amex Platinum Travel
cards.notes: 1 MR/₹50 base (~0.6%). Milestones: 7,500 MR on ₹1.9L + 10,000 MR on ₹4L + Taj voucher ₹10K. Effective ~4% on travel-heavy spending. Changes coming Mar 2026.

cards.name: Amex Gold (Charge Card)
cards.notes: 4,000 MR welcome. 1,000 bonus MR on 6x ₹1K txns/mo. Earns on fuel too. 10x via Reward Multiplier portal. ~2% effective. MR never expire. Charge card (pay in full).

cards.name: IndusInd Legend
cards.notes: 2 RP/₹100 weekends (=₹1 → 1%). 1 RP/₹100 weekdays (=₹0.50 → 0.5%). 1 RP=₹0.50 cash. Lifetime Free. RP never expire. Cash redemption cap 5,000 RP/mo.

cards.name: IndusInd Tiger
cards.notes: Up to 6 RP/₹100 @ ₹0.40 (=2.4%). Tier-based: 1.2% up to ₹1L, 7.2% above ₹5L/yr. Lifetime Free. Cash cap 5,000 RP/mo.

cards.name: IndusInd Platinum
cards.notes: Up to 8x RP/₹100 (~0.4% base). Discount vouchers of top brands. Lifetime Free entry-level.

cards.name: EazyDiner IndusInd
cards.notes: 10 RP/₹100 on dining/shopping/entertainment (~4% dining). Up to 50% off dining via EazyDiner Prime. Premium dining card.

cards.name: IndusInd Nexxt
cards.notes: India's first interactive card with buttons. 1%-2.5% rewards. Lifetime Free.

cards.name: YES BANK PaisaSave
cards.notes: 6% on dining & travel (12 RP/₹200 @ 1:1). 1% others. Fee waived on ₹1.2L spend. Top dining+travel card.

cards.name: YES Prosperity Cashback
cards.notes: ~1% cashback on all spends. Lifetime Free. Basic entry-level card from YES Bank.

cards.name: YES FIRST Exclusive
cards.notes: 9 RP/₹200 on travel (~3%). 6 RP/₹200 base (~1.5%). Unlimited domestic lounge. Golf. Premium card from YES Bank.

cards.name: Standard Chartered Ultimate
cards.notes: ~3.3% reward rate across all categories. Unlimited lounge access. Premium card. Fee waived on ₹6L spend. No fuel rewards.

cards.name: SC EaseMyTrip
cards.notes: Up to 12x points on EaseMyTrip (~5% travel). Base rewards on others (~1%). Good travel co-brand.

cards.name: SC DigiSmart
cards.notes: 5% cashback on online spend categories (avg ~2%). 0.5% others. Lifetime Free. Digital-first card.

cards.name: HSBC TravelOne
cards.notes: 4 RP/₹100 on flights, travel, international (=4%). 2 RP/₹100 others (=2%). Zero forex markup. Fee waived on ₹4L spend.

cards.name: HSBC Live+
cards.notes: 10% cashback on dining, grocery & food delivery. 1% others. Fee waived on ₹2L spend. Great for dining & groceries.

cards.name: HSBC Cashback
cards.notes: 1.5% cashback across all categories. No caps on cashback. Fee waived on ₹1L spend. Simple & straightforward.

cards.name: HSBC Smart Value
cards.notes: 2.5% on fuel. 1% on dining & groceries. 0.5% others. Lifetime Free. Fuel surcharge waiver.

cards.name: HSBC Taj Card
cards.notes: 5 RP/₹100 at Taj/Vivanta/Ginger hotels (=5%). 1.5 RP/₹100 others (=1.5%). 2 Taj stays + 1 Taj Palace stay on activation. Ultra-premium hotel card.

cards.name: BOBCARD Cashback
cards.notes: 5% on select online (4% accelerated + 1% base). 1% on others. Accelerated cap ₹1,500/mo (min 4 txns). 1% fuel surcharge waiver.

cards.name: BOBCARD Easy
cards.notes: ~0.5% rewards on all spends. Lifetime Free entry-level card. Fuel surcharge waiver.

cards.name: BOBCARD Premier
cards.notes: ~1.5% rewards. Lounge access. Milestone benefits. Premium BOB card.

cards.name: Canara Bank Visa Classic
cards.notes: 2 RP/₹100 (1 RP=₹0.25 → 0.5%). Flat rate across all categories. Lifetime Free. Up to 50 days interest-free. No fuel rewards.

cards.name: Canara Bank MasterCard World
cards.notes: 2 RP/₹100 (0.5%). LTF but ₹354 inactivity fee if spend <₹1L/yr. Domestic lounge: 3 self+2 guest/qtr. International: 2 self+2 guest/yr. 1% fuel surcharge waiver. GoIbibo: 12% off flights, 15% off hotels.

cards.name: Canara Bank RuPay Platinum
cards.notes: 2 RP/₹100 (0.5%). Lifetime Free. Basic RuPay card. Can be linked to UPI for CC-on-UPI payments. RuPay benefits apply.

cards.name: Canara Bank RuPay Select
cards.notes: 5% cashback on dining & utility bills (cap ₹50/mo each → effective on first ₹1,000/mo per category). 0.5% on others. LTF (₹300 inactivity fee if spend <₹10K/yr). Domestic lounge 2/qtr. International 2/yr. 1% fuel surcharge waiver. RuPay CC on UPI supported.

cards.name: Canara Bank RuPay Select Secured
cards.notes: Secured (FD-backed) variant. 5% cashback on dining & utility bills (cap ₹50/mo each). 0.5% on others. Limit ₹1L-50L based on FD. Lounge access. Concierge. RuPay CC on UPI supported.

cards.name: OneCard
cards.notes: 5x on top 2 spend categories (~1.25%). 1x others (~0.25%). Auto-detected. Lifetime Free metal card. No fuel rewards.

cards.name: AU LIT Credit Card
cards.notes: 3.5% on utility/bill payments. 1% all others. Lifetime Free.

cards.name: AU Altura Credit Card
cards.notes: 2% on online & utility spends. 1% others. Lounge access. Fee waived on ₹1L spend.

cards.name: AU Altura Plus
cards.notes: 2.5% on online & utility. 1.5% others. 4 lounge visits/qtr. Fee waived on ₹3L spend.

cards.name: Fi Federal Bank (powered by OneCard)
cards.notes: 5x on top 2 categories (~1.25%). 1x others (~0.25%). Powered by OneCard. Lifetime Free. No fuel rewards.
